response.overview: This film describes the expectations placed on people of a refugee/immigration background to behave a certain way, and fit into a mold of sorts, when in reality, people are diverse in their identity, their beliefs and experiences. The red string unifies different individuals when it runs through them and provides an important link. Connecting them like the string of a marionette. This emphasizes the unlikely community formed in detention centres through common experiences - of identity being stripped away from individuals
response.title: Neverending
